description:
Boyce and Harley are two of my favorite guys.
It is always fun to see Boyce get fucked, with his blue eyes and mischievous smile. And I love Harley, with his beautiful body and cute smile.
These two had great chemistry together. I especially like the first part when Harley pulled out his big, uncut cock and teased Boyce with it!
title: Harley & Boyce
